It could be the reason, God gave us free will was to instill in us our own =
 
little ego so, He could have a family, and plenty of company that would 
=
think  for them self. bonnie
 
 
In a message dated 8/4/2011 2:35:15 P.M. E=
astern Daylight Time,  
nena.razmara@... writes:

 
 
 
Well you are =
clearly in the minority on that thought pattern. Humans are  
designed to q=
uestion, understand, emulate and recreate. Noone wants to listen 
 to bits =
of nonesense out of a box we want to form a picture of what exits  
beyond =
the vail of human existence as we realize that our days are 
numbered.  Noo=
ne wants to become nothing. We all have egos get used to it.....you 
posses=
  one too.  
Sent via BlackBerry from T-Mobile  
__________________________=

Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: =
Another melt down?



I think everyone takes this stuff way tooooooo seriou=
s, with too  many 
expectations. I don't care about heavan, the afterlife, =
or crossing over  
spirits, or getting the proof, I let "them" talk, and I =
listen. Not gonna  judge 
what "they" say, and not gonna get offended if it=
 doesn't fit my world  view( 
or lack of world view). They tell me earth is=
 doomed, I don't care!  Que 
Sera, Sera (Whatever Will Be, Will Be).
 
 I d=
on't know anything, and I don't wanna know anything. Everything  
started f=
rom nothing, so the only true reality is nothing. Meditate on  
nothing--be=
 nothing! Nothing is everything, when you become nothing, you are  
everyth=
ing, you know everything. Nothing to it! 
 
 Yeah, get that past the ego fi=
lters. 
 
F-S


On Wed, Aug 3, 2011 at 6:29 PM, <_nena.razmara@..._ 
=
(mailto:nena.razmara@...) > wrote:


 
 
 
If we are not supposed to =
have access then why don't they just push block  
and delete? Sometimes. I =
think they are all insane on the otherside. Frankly 
 I am a bit disappoint=
ed that heaven has a ring tone and they sing the word 
 "heaven" over and o=
ver again. I can't say that I am looking forward to  
whatever lies beyond =
this mess.
Sent via BlackBerry from  T-Mobile
